title: Differentiated Elementary Mathematics Education Design Using Design Thinking and Eye-Tracking

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: An experimental education program for discovering mathematical talent in adult learners and designing personalized assignments

learning_goals: Learners can generate five types of math tasks explaining fraction concepts by applying the design thinking process
Can analyze learner preferences for task types with over 80% accuracy using eye-tracking technology
Can design and implement individualized math learning roadmaps based on analysis results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
